reviewText:
Met and exceeded my enjoyment,
Brought back earlier times with a laugh and smile!
Richard Pryor is soooo funny in these old shows.  Great for family
This is The original Chapelle Show I think The Godfather Paul Mooney would agree. Richard Pryor is comedy the Muhammed Ali of comedy.
iT was good for me,I like Richard Pryor he is so funny I injoy watching him, I'm going to miss him.
